answers.text:
Thank you to everyone who volunteered to help with this discussion. Cory now has a panel for the education session, “Too Many Hats.”

author: Cory Fleming
text:
Hi all,
I'm working as the manager for the Small Communities Track at the ICMA Annual Conference in Milwaukee this fall.  Doug Schulze, the leader/moderator for a session entitled, "Too Many Hats," would like to identify 4-6 managers and/or administrators who have seen it all and done it all to discuss how small community managers can stay on top of the work that needs to be done.
You won't need to prepare a formal presentation, just be willing to participate in a Q&A session and share from your own experiences.
If you're planning on being at Milwaukee and would like to participate in this discussion, please drop me a line at cfleming@icma.org or give me a call at 207-854-1083.
Many thanks for your interest,
Cory Fleming
title: Too Many Hats
